definition: from/through/via/to follow/to obey/to engage in (an activity)/never (in negative sentence)/(Taiwan pr. [zong4]) retainer/assistant/auxiliary/subordinate/related by common paternal grandfather or earlier ancestor
and/as well as/and so/but (not)/yet (not)/(indicates causal relation)/(indicates change of state)/(indicates contrast)

sentences.english: The supplies of sugar have been running low,causing a rise in the price.
sentences.chinese: 糖的供应日渐短缺，从而引起价格的上涨。

sentences.english: Signals in the spectrum can penetrate walls, making it ideal for wireless broadband.
sentences.chinese: 该频段的信号可以穿透墙壁，从而非常适合无线宽带。

sentences.english: A dog with the correct proportions and angulation can thereby achieve static balance.
sentences.chinese: 拥有的正确比例和角度，从而达到犬只的静态平衡。

sentences.english: It's ethnocentrism that leads to failure in international business.
sentences.chinese: 它的种族优越感从而导致其在国际贸易的失败。

sentences.english: Therefore, many notions that apply to rings and homomorphisms stem from geometric intuition.
sentences.chinese: 从而，环与同态中许多概念都源于几何直觉。

sentences.english: So that a new way to produce high-purity manganese carbonate is opened up.
sentences.chinese: 从而为高纯度碳酸锰的制备开辟了一条新的途径。

sentences.english: But small auctions can lead to low winning bids, and thus less profit.
sentences.chinese: 此外，小型拍卖会导致中标价过低，利润从而减少。

sentences.english: The omission of heat straightening may save energy and thus reduces production cost.
sentences.chinese: 特别是取消热调直可节约能源，从而降低生产成本。

sentences.english: Ocean waves move the hydraulic fluid, which spins the generator.
sentences.chinese: 海浪推动液压油从而驱动发电机运转。

sentences.english: This illustrates that this method has good prospect in practical positive-analysis application.
sentences.chinese: 从而说明本方法有实际正演应用的广阔前景。

sentences.english: Feelings often stand in the way of forgiveness, veiling judgment and common sense.
sentences.chinese: 情绪总是会影响判断和理智，从而阻碍宽恕的发生。

sentences.english: So as to avoid the operation of the strangeness players.
sentences.chinese: 从而避免了玩家操作上的陌生感。

sentences.english: Then the vortex-induced vibration response of cables is calculated.
sentences.chinese: 从而计算拖缆的涡激振动响应。

sentences.english: First, robots never get sick, so absenteeism would be reduced.
sentences.chinese: 首先，机器人从不生病，从而旷工将会减少。

sentences.english: It requires substantially less electrical consumption for deposition and, as a result, less refrigeration for cooling.
sentences.chinese: 电泳本身耗电量少，从而用于冷却的冷量也少。

sentences.english: Thus, operations of solving the equation and inner storage capacity are greatly reduced.
sentences.chinese: 从而使解方程的计算工作量和内贮容量大为减少。

definition: to make/to cause/to enable/to use/to employ/to send/to instruct sb to do sth/envoy/messenger
to induce/to promote/to urge/to impel/to bring about/to provoke/to drive (sb to do sth)/to catalyze/to actuate/to contribute to (some development)
therefore/as a result/thus/and as a result, ...
to lead to/to create/to cause/to bring about
to arise/to come into being/to come about/to give rise to/to bring into being/to bring about/to produce/to engender/to generate/to appear/appearance/emergence/generation/production/yield
to be capable of/to be able to/can
and/furthermore/also/together with/(not) at all/simultaneously/to combine/to join/to merge
and/as well as/and so/but (not)/yet (not)/(indicates causal relation)/(indicates change of state)/(indicates contrast)
